content: I've been experimenting with different cuisines lately, and I'm particularly interested in Japanese cooking. I attended a cooking demonstration on Japanese cooking at the local culinary school about three weeks ago, and I was fascinated by the simplicity and elegance of the dishes. I was wondering, can I use this homemade teriyaki sauce as a marinade for chicken or salmon before grilling or pan-frying? Would I need to adjust the amount of sauce or the marinating time?
